entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning early in the afternoon.
